entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 06:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Amount 20 mm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Bowen Island this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind light except southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island late this evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023
